title: cifti-create-scalar-series
description:
Import series data into cifti.

Convert a text file containing series of equal length into a cifti file.  The text file should have lines made up of numbers separated by whitespace, with no extra newlines between lines.

The <unit> argument must be one of the following:

SECOND
HERTZ
METER
RADIAN

opt_transpose.title: opt_transpose
opt_transpose.description: use if the rows of the text file are along the scalar dimension

opt_name_file_file.title: opt_name_file_file
opt_name_file_file.description: use a text file to set names on scalar dimension: text file containing names, one per line

start.title: start
start.description: the value at the first series point

anyOf.title: series
anyOf.description: set the units and values of the series

series.title: series
series.description: set the units and values of the series
